topComments.author: Greg Smith
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o √© o maior passeio em Alton Towers, mas se voc√™ tiver alguns minutos livres e a fila for curta, vale a pena rir ou apenas um passeio agrad√°vel se voc√™ tiver algumas crian√ßas mais novas com voc√™.  Al√©m disso, o operador √© t√£o irritante neste passeio 'choo choo' .. sim, todos sabemos que √© um trem lol 'choo choo'  O √∫nico b√¥nus se voc√™ pode cham√°-lo assim √© que ele gira duas vezes  (Original) Not the greatest ride at Alton Towers but if you have a spare few minutes and the queue is short it's worth the giggle or just a nice tame ride if you do happen to have some younger kids with you.  Also the operator is so annoying on this ride 'choo choo' ..yes we all know its a train lol 'choo choo'  The only bonus if you can call it that is that it goes round twice

topComments.author: Amo Singh
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Passeio fant√°stico para desfrutar com a fam√≠lia, especialmente crian√ßas com menos de 1,4 m, mas acima de 1,2 m! √â a irm√£ mais nova do homem de vime, mas definitivamente vale a pena!  Eu recomendaria a todos. O Ques pode ficar enorme! Eu recomendaria baixar o aplicativo Alton towers e ficar de olho no Ques. Isso tornar√° sua visita muito melhor. Montanha-russa da velha escola!  (Original) Fantastic ride to enjoy with the family especially children under 1.4m but over 1.2m! Is the younger sister into wicker Man but definitely worth it!  I would recommend it to all. The Ques can get massive! I would recommend downloading the Alton towers app and keeping an eye on the Ques. This will make your visit far better. Old school rollercoaster!

topComments.author: Sussy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) grande passeio, por vezes, quanto mais velho melhor este √© o passeio mais antiga, mas definitivamente divertido uma sa√≠da para ir para a equipe tornam realmente bom realmente divertido  (Original) great ride sometimes the older the better this is the the oldest ride but definetly fun an exiting to go on the staff make it really good really fun

topComments.author: ozzi
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) tchau tchau! a melhor parte √© quando voc√™ passa pelas corredeiras e acena um para o outro! bom passeio e recomendaria se a fila for curta, mas se voc√™ √© um ca√ßador de emo√ß√µes, sugiro outra coisa.  (Original) choo choo! best part is when you go past the rapids and you wave to each other! good ride and would recommend if queue is short, but if you are a thrill seeker I would suggest something else.

topComments.author: Andy Knapp
topComments.comment: Great family fun: but it is not part of the ‚Äúbig thrill‚Äù

topComments.author: Andrew Bond
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ame o trem da mina fugitivo, pode n√£o ser t√£o intenso como alguns dos outros coasters mas √© bom para passar o tempo  (Original) Love the Runaway Mine Train,  it may not be as intense as some of the other coasters but it a good for passing the time

topComments.author: Leigh Rogers
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Cl√°ssico absoluto! √ìtimo para todas as idades. Choo chooo!  (Original) Absolute classic! Great for all ages. Choo choooo!

topComments.author: Hannah Wild
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um passeio brilhante, muito simples mas r√°pido e divertido. A equipe torna tudo emocionante e nunca fica chato! √Äs vezes, os antigos s√£o os melhores!  (Original) A brilliant ride, very simple but fast and fun. The staff make it exciting and never gets boring! Sometimes the old ones are the best ones!

topComments.author: Hayden Smith
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â √≥timo, mas um pouco infantil demais em alguns peda√ßos. Boa experi√™ncia embora.  (Original) It is great but a bit too kiddy in some bits. Good experience though.

topComments.author: Carl Mcclelland
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o consigo credenciar este passeio o suficiente. O passeio em si √© simples, √© uma montanha-russa com motores a bordo sobre uma estrutura de a√ßo com pouca emo√ß√£o real e emo√ß√£o para o entusiasta veterano da montanha-russa. O que tornou este passeio especial foi a ferocidade e o incentivo inflex√≠vel para voltar. Depois de pedalar 2 vezes anteriormente com passes r√°pidos e a lament√°vel situa√ß√£o de forte aguaceiro por 1 hora que fechou as demais pedaladas. Isso fez com que nossa divers√£o na viagem se tornasse parab√≥lica devido √† habilidade fant√°stica dos operadores de estimular o momento e a emo√ß√£o da viagem com palavras simples, ‚Äòchoo choo‚Äô, que com seu forte sotaque foi pronunciado ‚Äò‚Äô mastigar mastigar ‚Äô‚Äô. Em nossa terceira viagem consecutiva, nosso hype do operador dizendo ‚Äò‚Äô choo choo ‚Äôapenas adicionou fogo aos eventos inacredit√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãque ocorreram. As carruagens foram preparadas e montadas com pessoas de todas as classes sociais, mu√ßulmanos em burkas, pais e filhos, √≠ndios em seus vestidos tradicionais, crian√ßas de pequenas idades e mulheres andando sozinhas, algumas das quais pareciam conservadoras quanto ao prazer dos passeios ou desanimadas pela forma como eles podem abra√ßar o que estava por vir. Isso podia ser ouvido por conversa fiada enquanto minha irm√£ e eu esper√°vamos pacientemente para o ataque de risadas que estava por vir. Voc√™ pode estar se perguntando o que mudou na carruagem anterior? O que mudou foi a disposi√ß√£o de cada pessoa em abrir m√£o de suas inibi√ß√µes e aproveitar o momento da fuga do trem da mina. Quando sa√≠mos da esta√ß√£o ap√≥s uma verifica√ß√£o completa de seguran√ßa, o operador terminou seu tanoide com ‚Äò‚Äô choo choo ‚Äô. Esta foi a terceira vez em minutos que eu estava cavalgando e come√ßou o inc√™ndio que queimou Roma. Choo Choo! Foi gritado por alguns quando sa√≠mos, mas n√£o todos ... Ainda assim. Os aplausos e choo's come√ßaram a aumentar lentamente em sua primeira passagem Apenas para aumentar exponencialmente quando o passeio come√ßou sua segunda passagem Minha irm√£ e eu gritando e gritando as palavras sagradas 'choo choo'. Quando o vag√£o estava terminando, todo o trem e os vag√µes subseq√ºentes estavam t√£o agitados com a necessidade de outro passe que recebemos a aprova√ß√£o do senhor supremo e salvador dos escolhidos para voltarmos. Isso s√≥ alimentou a fornalha j√° ardente de choo's que havia nascido como se fosse um evento de supernova. Eu s√≥ posso imaginar a cena como um espectador. Voc√™ podia sentir as vibra√ß√µes das frequ√™ncias emitidas por 20 pessoas gritando choo choo. Fomos aben√ßoados o suficiente com uma terceira corrida neste passeio e todos n√≥s sab√≠amos que honra era ter essa oportunidade. Mas √© aqui que a hist√≥ria se torna lenda. Enquanto nossas carruagens, gritos estrondosos vinham chacoalhando em dire√ß√£o √† esta√ß√£o. Pessoas chorando de tanto rir, homens adultos gritando Choo Choo e as pessoas na fila rindo. Uma crian√ßa gritava com tanta paix√£o de volta pelos trens de lealdade inquestion√°vel e total comprometimento em dar cada Choo Choo poss√≠vel. O trem diminuiu a velocidade para parar .. estava parando .. n√£o .. Nosso generoso deus e operador sabia que √©ramos os escolhidos. Ele nos enviou novamente, pela 4¬™ vez. O outro assistente de passageiro parecia o operador benevolente com um rosto questionando o que ele estava fazendo. Isso s√≥ fez com que as pessoas j√° incontrol√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãdo trem o levassem a um n√≠vel que s√≥ √© ouvido em lendas e mitos. Eu n√£o ficaria surpreso se nossos aplausos e Choo fossem ouvidos do outro lado do parque. As pessoas na fila olhavam para n√≥s como se f√¥ssemos estrelas do rock. Meus ombros pareciam mais largos e eu tinha crescido 7 cent√≠metros de altura. Quando finalmente chegamos ao nosso fim na esta√ß√£o, um aplauso de p√© foi dado √† operadora. Enquanto sa√≠amos, a multid√£o movia-se com pura energia, todos cantavam e zombavam das palavras sagradas. Choo choo. Chegamos √† cabine de fotos. J√° estivemos por a√≠ tantas vezes que t√≠nhamos 2 fotos que ficar√£o para sempre gravadas na mem√≥ria de todos os que viveram este momento.  (Original) I cannot accredit this ride enough. The ride itself is simple, it is a powered rollercoaster with onboard motors upon a steel frame with little real excitement and thrill for the veteran rollercoaster enthusiast  . What made this ride special was the ferocity and unyielding encouragement to go again. After riding 2 times previously with fast passes and the unfortunate situation of heavy downpour for 1 hours that had closed the other rides. It caused our enjoyment of the ride to go  parabolic due to the operators uncanny knack to spur the moment and excitement of the ride with the simple words, ‚Äò choo choo‚Äô of which with his thick accent was pronounced ‚Äò‚Äô chew chew‚Äô‚Äô. On our third consecutive ride, our hype of the operator saying ‚Äò‚Äôchoo choo‚Äô only further added fire to the unbelievable events that occurred. The carriages were primed and set with people of all walks off life, Muslims in burkas , fathers and sons , Indians in their tradition gowns, children of small ages and women going solo, some of which seemed conservative about the rides enjoyment or discouraged by how they may embrace what was to come. This could be heard by idle chit chatter as my sister and I waited patiently to the onslaught of laughter that was to come. You may be asking what had changed from the previous carriage? What had changed was the willingness of each person to let go of their inhibitions and enjoy the moment of the runaway mine train. As we left the station after a thorough safety check, the operator finished his tanoid with ‚Äò‚Äôchoo choo‚Äô. This was the 3rd time within minutes I was riding and it had started the fire that burnt Rome. Choo Choo! Was screamed by some as we left but not all‚Ä¶.Yet. The cheers and choo‚Äôs started to increase slowly on its first pass Only to exponentially increase as the ride started its second pass My sister and I screaming and shouting the holy words ‚Äòchoo choo‚Äô. By the time the carriage was coming to its end the whole train and subsequent carriages were so riled up with the need for another pass we were given the approval of the overlord and savior of choos to go again. This only stoked the already burning furnace of choo‚Äôs that had been birthed as if it was a supernova event. I can only imagine the scene as a spectator. You could feel the vibrations of frequencies emitted by 20 people screaming choo choo. We were blessed enough with a 3rd run on this ride and we all knew what an honor it was to be given such opportunity. But here is where the story becomes legend. As our carriages thunderous screams came rattling towards the station. People crying from laughter , grown men screaming Choo Choo and the queuing people laughing. A small child screamed with so much passion back by the trains unquestionable loyalty and total commitment to giving every Choo Choo possible. The train slowed down to stop.. it was stopping.. no.. Our generous god and operator knew we were the chosen ones. He sent us again, for the 4th time. The other passenger assistant had looked the benevolent operator with a face questioning what he was doing. This only caused the already uncontrollable people on the train to take it to a level that are only heard in legends and myths. I would not be surprised if our cheers and Choo‚Äôs were heard on the other side of the park. People in the queue were looking at us as if we were rock stars. My shoulders felt broader and I had grown 3 inches in height. When we finally came to our end in the station, a standing applaud was given to the operator. As we walked out the crowd was running on pure energy everyone was chanting and jeering the holy words. Choo choo. We arrived at the photo booth. We had been around so many times we had 2 photos which will forever be engrained in the memory of all who experienced this moment in time.

topComments.author: Chris Heath (slimmct)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O trem de mina em fuga atrai os melhores operadores de passeio. O passeio em si √© um passeio de trem em uma mina razoavelmente r√°pido que as crian√ßas e adultos v√£o adorar como introdu√ß√£o a passeios maiores. S√£o as operadoras que fazem desta atra√ß√£o uma atra√ß√£o com culto e adora√ß√£o por muitos. Choo-choooooo  (Original) Runaway mine train attracts the best ride operators. The ride itself is a fairly fast rolling and twisting mine train ride that kids, and adults, will love as their introduction to bigger rides. It is the operators that make this an attraction with cult following and adored by many. Choo-choooooo

topComments.author: Emily Gaspar

Minha filha mais nova acabou de completar tr√™s anos e montou pela primeira vez hoje - sua primeira montanha-russa adequada! üé¢ Todo o caminho em volta, ela estava dizendo: "Isso √© divertido ... Este meu favorito. Eu adoro isso!"  (Original) Loved it as always, and the slow-mo video is a great addition! My youngest daughter has just turned three and rode it for the first time today - her first proper rollercoaster! üé¢ All the way around she was saying, "This is fun... This my favourite. I love it!"

topComments.author: phil t

It's rare that me and my 4 year old daughter can both enjoy a ride equally, but this is good fun for all ages

topComments.author: Charley Tordoff
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Bom passeio que tem um ritmo r√°pido e algumas voltas e mais voltas, mas nada assustador. Eu pessoalmente tive uma hora de espera, o que n√£o foi t√£o ruim, considerando que a viagem leva duas voltas. A seguran√ßa poderia ter sido melhor, pois minha barra particular estava muito perdida.  (Original) Good ride altogether that has a fast pace and some twists and turns but nothing terrifying. I personally had an hour wait which wasnt too bad considering that the ride takes two laps. The safety could have been better as my particular bar was very lose.
